extends java.lang.Object
     init()->begin()->getXXX(index)->release()
           ^           |

 建议13ms读取一次手柄数据

        获取位置（只有6dof该数据才有有效数据） 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        index - HANDEDNESS_RIGHT
              HANDEDNESS_LEFT
              HANDEDNESS_HEAD
 
        

        Returns:
        

        位置，数组大小为3(x, y, z)

      • 

        getButtonDown
        

        public boolean getButtonDown(int index,
                             int btnKey)
        

        按键是否按下(仅按下时为true，不记录过程)

 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        index - HANDEDNESS_RIGHT
               HANDEDNESS_LEFT
               HANDEDNESS_HEAD
        

        btnKey - TOUCHPAD   = 1 << 0;
               APP        = 1 << 1;
               RETURN     = 1 << 2;
               HOME       = 1 << 3;
               GRIP       = 1 << 4;
               TRIGGER    = 1 << 8;
 
        

        Returns:
        

        true-当前刚好为按下的动作(非持续性动作)
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        getButtonState
        

        public int getButtonState(int index)
        

        按键状态，返回按键的键值(记录整个按下的过程)

 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        index - HANDEDNESS_RIGHT
              HANDEDNESS_LEFT
              HANDEDNESS_HEAD
        

        Returns:
        

        TOUCHPAD   = 1 << 0;
          APP        = 1 << 1;
          RETURN     = 1 << 2;
          HOME       = 1 << 3;
          GRIP       = 1 << 4;
          TRIGGER    = 1 << 8;
 
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        getButtonState
        

        public boolean getButtonState(int index,
                              int btnKey)
        

        按键状态，按下状态始终是1(记录整个按下的过程)

 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        index - HANDEDNESS_RIGHT
              HANDEDNESS_LEFT
              HANDEDNESS_HEAD
        

        btnKey - TOUCHPAD   = 1 << 0;
               APP        = 1 << 1;
               RETURN     = 1 << 2;
               HOME       = 1 << 3;
               GRIP       = 1 << 4;
               TRIGGER    = 1 << 8;

        getButtonUp
        

        public boolean getButtonUp(int index,
                           int btnKey)
        

        按键是否弹起(仅弹起时为true，不记录过程)

 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        index - HANDEDNESS_RIGHT
               HANDEDNESS_LEFT
               HANDEDNESS_HEAD
        

        btnKey - TOUCHPAD   = 1 << 0;
               APP        = 1 << 1;
               RETURN     = 1 << 2;
               HOME       = 1 << 3;
               GRIP       = 1 << 4;
               TRIGGER    = 1 << 8;
 
        

        Returns:
        

        true-当前刚好为弹起的动作(非持续性动作)

        public int getConnectionState(int index)
        

        获取当前连接状态

 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        index - HANDEDNESS_RIGHT
              HANDEDNESS_LEFT
              HANDEDNESS_HEAD
 
        

        Returns:
        

        3代表已连接
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        getGyro
        

        public float[] getGyro(int index)
        

         扩展项,仅仅针对nolo手柄
      [0]TouchPad上(1 << 8)下(1 << 9)左(1 << 10)右(1 << 11)按下键值
      [2]TRIGGER键按下的过程值(0-1)
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        index - HANDEDNESS_RIGHT
              HANDEDNESS_LEFT
              HANDEDNESS_HEAD
 
        

        Returns:
        

        三位数据
